entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo From all I've read social distancing & not touching one's face before washing one's hands thoroughly is more important than wearing a mask. It will be interesting to see what #COVID19 does after all the protests and riots in a week or so. Hope NY won't need more hospital beds.
